verbs.description: it [V: citrus] [ARGM-MNR: with an exotic twist] southern california has the perfect climate for growing unusual citrus some of the more interesting include fruited blood oranges fragrant - leaved kaffir limes and the surprisingly enormous tracy kahn citrus county of sicily mediterranean malaysia la verne nursery david karp daniel nelson taiwan chandler moro
